# Border Link

> Expert Customs Clearance & Logistics Solutions in Dubai and across the UAE.

Border Link Cargo & Customs Broker LLC facilitates seamless cross-border trade with fast, reliable customs clearance at the Hatta-Dubai border and all UAE ports.

## Main Links

- [Home](https://borderlink.info/)
- [About Us](https://borderlink.info/about)
- [Contact](https://borderlink.info/contact)

## Services

Border Link offers a comprehensive range of logistics services:

- **Customs Clearance**: Processing imports and exports at all UAE borders.
- **Approvals & Registrations**: Handling Dubai Municipality and Ministry approvals.
- **Logistics & Transportation**: Reliable transport solutions across the UAE & GCC.
- **E-Services**: 24/7 online support for customs documentation.
